metadata.name: BLK I
metadata.description:
the world transforms into the shape of a block.
endless chains of hopes are lined up together.
filling the black hole.
while we are staring into the flickering light of the monitor.
trying to hold on.
let it be infinite.
the future histories are locked into phrases.
our idea of existence arranges itself into a new age.
and while we see ourselves floating up.
the old world disintegrates into dust and soil.

attributes.value: pixels on monitor moved by an algorithm
3D generated shapes set in a white digital space
